name: Let's Keep A Little Optimism Here (V)
Lore: 'The heroes of the Rebellion know that where there is life, there is hope.',
Text: 'Deploy on your non-droid character present at a battleground site; character may not be carried from here or move. Target a Dark Jedi at a site. You lose no more than 1 Force to Force drains at target''s location. This Utinni Effect canceled when reached by target.(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
